item.description:
As always, we'll start around 1 and go until 5:30 or 6

Swap theme #1: Path through the trees

Swap theme #2: Use the shading technique demonstrated by Pat at the March meeting. If you need a reminder go to the Photos section and you'll find an album called Shading Technique Samples. Just add some shading using pencils, paint or markers around anything on your card and you'll be fine.

Other activities to be announced, but please RSVP now!
item.how_to_find_us: Enter near the door at the back of the parking lot (look for signs)

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: NE ATC+ April 2012 monthly Meetup in Natick--NOTE DATE CHANGE to 4/28
